timeline.bodyText: Missing full stop at the end.
timeline.author: tharindu-bandara
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2662,7 +2657,7 @@ components:
           format: int64
           example: 86400
         renewRefreshToken:
-          description: "Decideds the refresh token needs to renewed during refresh grant flow"
+          description: "Decides whether the refresh token needs to renewed during refresh grant flow"

timeline.bodyText: Is missing full stop is intentional?
timeline.author: tharindu-bandara
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1790,7 +1785,7 @@ paths:
       tags:
         - Application Metadata
       summary: |
-        Retrieve all the metadata related to the auth protocol WS_Trust
+        Retrieve all the metadata related to the auth protocol WS Trust

replies.bodyText: Yes. We decided not to include full stops in the summary fields
replies.author: mefarazath
